about.title: About me
about.p1: I am a Telematics Engineering student (URJC) and the author of Code-XR, an ecosystem that connects static analysis with immersive visualization of metrics.
about.p2: Our work has been accepted for VISSOFT 2025 (co-located with ICSME 2025). I am preparing the thesis and consolidating documentation and tooling for its evolution.
about.p3: I care about clean code, modular architecture, and a strong DX/UX. I aim for systems that scale and can be maintained.

profile.title: About Me
profile.subtitle: Get to know the person behind the code
profile.name: AdriÃ¡n Montes Linares
profile.bio1:
I am a Telecommunications Engineer graduated from Universidad Rey Juan Carlos in 2026, with a strong focus on practical building and continuous learning. I enjoy understanding how systems work internally and transforming that knowledge into clear, well-designed, and useful solutions.

I particularly value projects where I can be involved end-to-end: from initial idea and architectural decisions to implementation, documentation, and iterative improvement. For me, programming is not just about writing codeâ€”it is about structuring complex problems and turning them into coherent, maintainable systems.
profile.bio2:
I consider myself curious, disciplined, and committed. I value teamwork, clear communication, and ownership of what I build. I am motivated by technical challenges and by exploring different professional domains to keep growing both technically and personally.

Outside of purely technical work, I enjoy traveling, discovering new cultures and perspectives, and maintaining a healthy balance between professional growth and personal life. I believe this balance helps me bring a broader perspective to the projects I work on.

urjc.desc: Comprehensive training in software engineering, networks, and systems. Progressive specialization in full-stack development and XR technologies. Final thesis linked to VISSOFT 2025.

adyra.desc: Automation of internal processes through scripts and digital tools. Optimization of time and reduction of manual errors in day-to-day operations.

vbgroup.desc: End-to-end development of internal tool for management/operations. Backend with Express.js and TypeScript, integrating Azure Cosmos DB and Blob Storage. Frontend with React + Tailwind. Teamwork under Agile/Scrum.

codexr.desc: VS Code extension for XR/3D/AR visualization of software metrics. End-to-end architecture: static analysis, XR scene mapping, documentation. +300 downloads on Marketplace.

vissoft.desc: Research paper on XR visualization of software metrics accepted for presentation at international conference.

cambridgeC1.desc: Advance English proficiency to professional fluency across technical and business contexts. Comprehensive exam covering reading, writing, speaking, and listening.

masterAI.desc: Specialized postgraduate degree in applied AI. Deep learning, Natural Language Processing, and XR applications combined with professional research and industry practices.
